function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to nature and outdoor spaces in residential buildings","Impact":"Decreased satisfaction with everyday life, potential impact on mental and physical health","Mitigation":"Creation of green spaces and outdoor areas within residential buildings","Technologies":"Use of green roof gardens, vertical gardens, and urban agriculture systems","People":"Residents of residential buildings","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, building developers"},{"Description":"High density in residential buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and spread in crowded spaces","Mitigation":"Implementation of ventilation systems, spacing of units, and sanitation protocols","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, and antimicrobial surface coatings","People":"Residents of residential buildings","Owner":"Building developers, property managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate social distancing in indoor common areas","Impact":"Higher risk of contagion and transmission of diseases among building occupants","Mitigation":"Design and layout modifications to promote physical distancing, implementation of occupancy limits","Technologies":"Digital occupancy monitoring systems, touchless fixtures, and mobile app-based scheduling","People":"Residents of residential buildings","Owner":"Facility managers, building administrators"}]}
